document.full_text: the u.n. nuclear watchdog chief said on tuesday there might be limited core damage at the no. 2 unit of the earthquake-stricken fukushima power plant.
document.title: u.n. atom chief sees possible japan plant core damage
lines_and_colors: the u.n. nuclear watchdog chief said on tuesday there might be limited core damage at the no. 2 unit of the earthquake-stricken fukushima power plant.
